channel.title: Fixed NPC Glock and Shotgun Sounds
channel.description:
So I 'fixed' the NPC Glock and Shotgun firing sounds.
[url='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/433824396128088912/A5240612C933719CC1BDED5ACF5DF790B4189AA9/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|637:358&composite-to=*,*|637:358&background-color=black'][img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/433824396128088912/A5240612C933719CC1BDED5ACF5DF790B4189AA9/?interpolation=lanczos-none&output-format=jpeg&output-quality=95&fit=inside|637:358&composite-to=*,*|637:358&background-color=black[/img][/url]
In retail BM, the firing sound of the Glock and Shotgun were changed. However, the NPC firing sounds still used the mod version's firing sounds. I changed the sound of the NPC Glock and Shotgun firing sound to use the retail version's, while keeping the distance echo effects the originals had. I wanted to add a shotgun pump sound as well, but as far as I know because of the way the distance effect works I can't (or maybe I'm just incompetent).
